name: Medi TD
description:
Medi TD tasks you with defending from waves of enemies. Explore 3 unique biomes in a beautiful hand drawn art-style.

Game levels are procedurally generated and if there will be enough interest I plan to release custom levels and leaderboards. 

Game is available for Android, iOS, mac, windows and linux. After minimum purchase you will have an access to android, mac, windows and linux binaries
